products.title: Rimini White - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini in white is a soft, fresh shade, perfect for adding light and air to any room it's placed in. Its pale colour and lightweight fabric mean that the room doesn't have to be dark every time you need a little privacy. Brighten up even the gloomiest of rooms by placing this blind in the window; it's ideal for small utility rooms or bathrooms. Alternatively, surround with pretty florals or bold bright shades in the bedroom or living room.

products.title: Origin Basic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin in basic white is made from heavy gauge aluminium guaranteed not to sag. Its wipe-clean practicality combined with the pure white, satin look finish make this blind an attractive option that is pleasing in both looks and functionality. If it's a fresh, clean style that you're looking for, blend the basic white with an all-white colour palette that's perfect for the bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout) White - Roller Blind
products.description: Do you have trouble sleeping with nighttime lights and summertime sun? The rimini (blackout) range is specially designed to shield against harsh glares and unwanted light for a good night's sleep or day's relaxation, and this simple white edition does it with refined and classy style. Whilst the white will provide a refreshing lift to any surrounding, try balancing with a soothing lemon or muted lime walls for energising colour contrast.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout) Vanilla - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout vanilla allows you to add that subtle and refined touch of style to your home that it can be so hard to pin down. It's a gentle blend of cream and beige that sits elegantly in the background, giving your other colours the freedom to come to the fore and catch the eye. If you want to add something elegant and understated to the master bedroom then try combining vanilla with a matching rug atop a laminate floor.

products.title: Ecowood Brilliant White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a timeless look and feel, brilliant white satin from their ever-popular ecowood range offers you a chance to breathe new life into any space. The crisp tone of the white shines through in the background - adding the perfect finishing touch to the contemporary look you've carefully created. We love the idea of pairing brilliant white with crisp white fabrics and light stone grey scatter cushions in the master bedroom.

products.title: Ecowood Washed White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: A subtly layered finish creates the standout look that we call washed white satin. The washed out white provides the ideal canvas for the gentle ebb and flow of the grain that comes through the closer you look. For a relaxing ambience that will have you drifting off to sleep in no time at all why not pair washed white with some gentle blue walls and a lightly coloured wooden floor? Ideal for taking you back to memories of the coast as you fall into the deepest sleep the moment your head hits the pillow.

products.title: Ecowood Absolute White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With realistic woodgrain texturing for an authentic feel, the ecowood in absolute white fine grain displays an icy white tone and a matt finish. Alongside thick, sturdy slats, this blind features a matching headrail, pelmet, and bottom rail for a classy, finished look. For a bright and breezy bathroom look, where the water-resistant absolute white fine grain will settle in perfectly, post the blind against clean aqua walls.

products.title: Ecowood Brilliant White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Brilliant white fine grain combines a calm and pure white with an intriguing texture which adds depth and subtly to any room in the house. As the light catches your eye you'll see how the textured lines gently ebb and flow to give the piece a unique look and feel. Finding the perfect finishing touch for the spare bedroom can be difficult, so why not go in a different direction? The neutral colouring works in any setting, whilst the natural flow of the lines adds a calming presence that will have your guests drifting off to sleep in no time at all.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout) White - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout white is a roller blind that allows you to drift off into a deep sleep the moment your head hits the pillow. With a light and breezy design that's easy on the eye, and crafted with care from their signature blackout fabric, it's everything you need to create your own little oasis of calm. Matching trinity white with neutral walls and light stained floors is an inspired choice if you want to create a bedroom that you can rest and relax in before bedtime.

products.title: Roma Polar - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma's polar is an icy mint green, verging on turquoise, and is the ideal hue for giving a room a unique, pretty feel. It's crisp, modern tone means that light can still penetrate through, even when closed, so you'll never feel shut in. Beautiful when set against pure white walls, the polar is a great choice for a fresh, airy living room, or a bright utility. The shade will also work well amongst browns and beiges, so don't be afraid to add a splash of colour to your neutral living room or office.

products.title: Ecowood Vanilla Kiss Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The smooth and silky finish of the ecowood in vanilla kiss satin makes for a lush and refreshing look. The delicate colour plus the durable functionality makes a winning combination, blending style and durability with ease which is what every modern home needs. Insert the vanilla kiss satin into a bright and breezy french-style kitchen, surrounding it with similar vanilla creams, soft whites, and palest pastels.

products.title: Ecowood Vanilla Kiss Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in vanilla kiss fine grain has all the charm of a painted blind, combined with the authentic feel of a real wood blind. Made from a realistic faux wood, this is a durable and hardwearing piece that will stand the test of time and the moistness of your bathroom. Use the vanilla kiss fine grain in the bathroom or kitchen along with an understated wood and cream colour scheme. Go for wood paneling or units, along with matching cream walls and accessories.

products.title: Spectrum Peach White - Venetian Blind
products.description: A pretty, delicate shade of cream, the spectrum in peach white has a subtle hint of, you guessed it, peach hue. The dainty colour of this blind does little to betray the strength and durability of the materials used, with its heavy gauge aluminium slats that will never sag. The peach white will harmonise beautifully with true colour peaches and apricots, to create a wonderfully sophisticated and unusual colour scheme in a living room or bedroom.

products.title: Spectrum Gloss White - Venetian Blind
products.description: The shiny gloss finish of the spectrum's gloss white shows off the quality of its heavy gauge aluminium slats, and comes with matching rails as well as pull-cords, which allow you to control the light coming into the room with ease. For a sheen to match the finish of a high quality suite, use in the bathroom amongst white floor and wall tiling. Then use a bold accent colour, such as cerise or orange, to add a pop of colour, which you can change at will.

products.title: Spectrum White China - Venetian Blind
products.description: A soft, off-white, with a subtle satin finish, the spectrum in white china is pretty and discreet in appearance, yet strong and durable in functionality, due to its heavy gauge aluminium slats, and high quality fittings in the form of matching pull-cords and rails. Integrate the white china into a calming pastel colour palette in your home office, where you can combine a cool aesthetic with workable practicality.

products.title: Ecowood Absolute White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Silky smooth, as its name suggests, the ecowood in absolute white satin has a beautifully untextured finish and the icy white is clean and refreshing. Wide slats form the main structure of this blind, easily adjustable for light, air, and privacy versatility. Enhance the pure, fresh white of the absolute white satin and pit it against an equally clean-toned mint green for a calming yet energising ambience in the kitchen.

products.title: Spectrum Cotton White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Spectrum's cotton white comprises of off-white, gloss finish slats and matching fittings, including the pull-cords and rails. This is a colour for those who want the purity of white without the dazzling brightness of it. Incorporate into an off-white, modern country kitchen to add a hint of contemporary utilitarianism to the mix. Accent with soft silvers and dove greys for a cool, fresh style, or with brushed golds and cappuccino beiges for a warm and welcoming colour theme that will make your guests never want to leave.

products.title: Roma Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: The snowy white of the roma pure is fresh and cool, allowing plenty of light in from outside, yet offering privacy and neutrality. The fabric is lightweight and durable, making it the ideal option for a blind that could get a lot of use. Light, airy living rooms make beautiful entertainment spaces, and this blind will only help to set that off. The soft hue won't clash in an all-white environment, and also creates an excellent colour break when teamed with bright colours such as emerald greens, poppy reds, and sky blues.

products.title: Roma Polar - Vertical Blind
products.description: Not quite mint, yet not quite aqua either, the roma in polar is a unique, icy green shade that will add a cool sophisticated to your home dcor. Soft but sturdy cotton-feel fabric gathers neatly into hanging louvres that can be opened and closed swiftly and neatly. Makeover a white bathroom by using it as the perfect canvas for the polar, supplementing it with silver fixtures and fittings; or create a gorgeous cool hue in the guest bedroom, where your visitors will love to wake up to this refreshing shade.

products.title: Richmond Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The ice white of the richmond pure is fresh and inviting, and its feathery lines offer texture and depth. The sleek, clean lines of the vertical blind complement the pattern perfectly, providing a handsome contrast between hard and soft. Place the pure in the bathroom, where its clean white hue will match a classic suite wonderfully. Keep the room bright and fresh by sticking to a one-colour palette, accenting only with silver fixtures and fittings for a contemporary feel.

products.title: Decor Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a stylish window arrangement, choose the dcor in pure, where a fusion of silk-inspired threads craft a modest blind with creative arcs and elevated stitching. This brilliantly white fabric rests on movable louvres to allow you to control the amount of light and ventilation entering the room. For a delicately stylish kitchen with fresh and reviving colour, match the stark pure with peaceful duck egg blue hues.

products.title: Henderson Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: In slightly raised stitching, the henderson pure displays subtle stripes on a smooth white canvas. The colour is a soft ice white with a clean and refreshing aesthetic and, hung in the vertical slats, looks streamlined and ordered. Hang the pure in your home office for a studious yet fresh look. Team with cool blues to continue the clean, contemporary theme, opting for light wooden furniture and floorboards, then adorning with throws, cushions, and accessories in subtle blues and whites.

products.title: Rochester Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The striking rochester in pure contains both brilliant, white shade and mesmerising adornments. The dreamy, satin-like threads create a fascinating display of contrasting textures, producing a classy look, with the added benefit of adjustable louvres to allow both ventilation and privacy. To create a serene haven with calming hues, present the pure in your restroom amidst a soothing setting of cornflower blue.

products.title: Roma Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Roma's pure filter blind is just that - pure, in the form a beautiful snow white. This lightly textured blind will allow light to trickle through whilst offering privacy and style when closed. But you can always use the adjustable louvres to open it, and let in all the light you want. Generate a clean and refreshing look in your bedroom by combining the pure with cool pastel blues or greens; or hang in a family bathroom alongside sea blues or soft aquas, and accessorise with silvers or golds depending on your preference.

products.title: Vista Basic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: For all of the cool, with less of the colour, choose the vista in basic white, a sturdy blind made from heavy gauge aluminium, fully adjustable using the pull-cords so that you can allow more or less light in with ease. Made with perforated slats to let the light gently filter through when open or closed, creating a soft atmosphere. Industrialise your home office, where all the work gets done, by settling the basic white amongst functional white furniture and brushed silver fittings.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Brilliant White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you want to discover a timeless look that will add a contemporary finishing touch to any room in your home, brilliant white satin deluxe is the perfect choice for you. Sleek, crisp, and simple; every inch is carefully crafted to enable you to sit back and relax like never before. Transform the living room into the relaxing space you never want to leave by combining brilliant white with charcoal fabrics and a laminate wooden floor.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Absolute White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a chic, designer aesthetic, the ecowood deluxe's absolute white fine grain displays a snow-toned, grain-textured faux wood, formed skilfully into wide, adjustable slats. Coordinating fittings feature alongside, including woven linen ladder ribbons for ultimate vogue. Craft a warm and welcoming atmosphere in the guest bedroom, placing the absolute white fine grain amidst warm peach walls and matching white furnishings.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Brilliant White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you trace your eye across brilliant white fine grain deluxe you come to see how the lines gently wind their way across the surface. When you combine this with the purity of the white, you have the perfect way to add a sense of calm and balance to any room you choose. Matching is all about adding colour contrasts that bring both sides of the equation to life. Light wooden floors and dark charcoal fabrics would be inspired choices in the living room.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Washed White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a subtle finish that will please even the most discerning eye, washed white satin is the latest deluxe addition to their ever-popular ecowood range. The white is beautifully accented by the grain of the wood and the linen ladders top things off in style. Take your mind back to the relaxing setting of the coast by working in a light stained wood floor and some light blue walls. Perfect for creating the relaxing ambience that will have you switched off from the events of the day the moment you put your key in the door.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Vanilla Kiss Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: As luxurious as the range's name, the ecowood deluxe in vanilla kiss satin has all the creaminess you could wish for. With a silky smooth texture and classic yet contemporary look, this blind offers as much in the looks department as it does function. Compliment a plum feature wall by hanging the vanilla kiss satin directly onto the colour, toning it down and adding sophistication and depth. Remember to add coordinating ornaments and trinkets to this luxe look, which would be ideal in a master bedroom or living room.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Vanilla Kiss Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: As sweet and creamy as ice cream, the ecowood deluxe vanilla kiss fine grain is just that a sweeping kiss of yellow creaminess as refreshing as summer. The pretty shade is complimented by the fine grain texture that offers the look and feel of real wood. Surround the vanilla kiss fine grain with equally luxurious shades like rose pinks or lush lavenders for a gorgeously fresh look in a master or guest bedroom.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Absolute White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: As luxurious as its collection suggests, the ecowood deluxe in absolute white satin has a smooth, satiny finish, accompanied by a purest white colouring. Coordinating fixtures, including designer-look linen ladder ribbons, enhance this chic look for a clean and unobstructed aesthetic. For a sleek monochrome look, couple the absolute white satin with dove grey walls and slick, black furniture. Use whites and silvers as accenting colours to finish off the look - one that would be ideal for a home office or studio space.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: The simple yet elegant roma (fr) in snow forms a graceful look with its delicate and pliable cloth, which also holds a quality, flame-retardant benefit. This agile fabric produces a sophisticated feel with its simple rolling mechanism, and in a soothing and versatile white shade. Frame the alluring snow with a contrasting coral or plum shade, to both accent the striking white of the blind and create a distinctive colour scheme for the remaining dcor.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) White - Roller Blind
products.description: White might not be your first instinct when looking for a blackout blind, but don't rule out the palermo (blackout) white just because of its colour. When it comes to keeping out harmful and distracting uv rays, this blind comes top of the class. The wipe-clean fabric of the palermo range makes this the perfect choice for kitchen windows, and will really gleam paired with colourful patterns and light wood worktops.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: Light pollution is a recognised problem in many homes, so include the revolutionary and modern origin (blackout) in snow within any decor scheme for a beneficial blind with contemporary colour. The origin (blackout) is a quality crafted collection of blackout blinds that mix both practicality with style, and the gorgeous snow offers this along with cool, clean whiteness. Match the snow with bold blocks of dove grey, cobalt, and alike whites to form a current decor style with contemporary colours.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout) Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: The ajanta (blackout) in pure is more than simply a white blackout blind. The silvery white background shimmers as the light hits it, and is pleasantly interrupted by the abstract white patterning, making this the perfect blind for adding a little magic to your home. The clean freshness of the pure is perfect for a bathroom, and will look great surrounded by turquoises, whites, and silvers. Or try it in the utility room or cloakroom to provide a touch of icy white sparkle to the room.

products.title: Affinity Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: The affinity pure takes a lightweight, easy-hanging white fabric with a subtle hint of cream, and uses it to host a pure white, modern pattern. The contrast between the stitching and fabric adds interest to an otherwise neutral blind. Use the affinity pure as part of a fresh, neutral colour scheme in a living room or home office. Or make a real feature of it, by setting it amongst brightly painted walls to make it really stand out in a colourful bedroom or playroom.

products.title: Splash (Blackout) Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: The beautiful white and shimmering accents of the splash (blackout) pure work together to create a pretty and clean blackout blind. A generous and wipe-clean fabric carries this attractive pattern, and is easily rolled and unrolled at leisure. Use the pure in the bathroom for a fresh and spotless look, and complement with silver fixtures and fittings, adding in the occasional splash of blue or turquoise if bold colours are your preference.

products.title: Capri (Blackout) Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: The pure white of the capri (blackout) pure is complemented perfectly by the hints of silver in its delicate pattern. Totally undistinguishable as a blackout blind, due to its pretty style and light colour, the pure is nonetheless incredibly competent when it comes to keeping unwanted light out of your home. The pure would suit a clean, fresh, and contemporary kitchen, with white units and silver accessories to bring out its colour, and would also work as a stylish feature in an otherwise plain utility room or downstairs cloakroom.

products.title: Origin Seashell White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Seashell white instantly brings your mind back to the purity and calmness of the coastline. With everything in life taken care of at its own speed, all that is left for you to do is lie back and take in the unique aesthetic as you get the rest and relaxation you have been searching for. The perfect blend of sleek finish and gentle colouring. Origin, seashell white - venetian blind seashell white instantly brings your mind back to the purity and calmness of the coastline.

products.title: Origin White - Day Night Blind
products.description: Using sleek, modern threads, the origin white showcases a smooth and pliable, yet strong and sturdy, fabric in an icy lily white. The cloth hosts a sliding strip of white netting that can be raised or lowered depending on your light and privacy needs. Settle the white against a red feature wall in the dining room, pairing with wooden floors and contemporary wooden furniture. Include plenty of reds and whites throughout the room, perhaps in place mats and crockery, to bring the look together.

products.title: Origin Bright White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Pure and simple in colour, the origin bright white is just as sleek and streamlined in design. Thick wooden slats, formed from ecologically managed basswood, accompany high quality components in matching white, so that you can be sure of a coordinated look offering style and coherency. The bright white will look simply striking against almost any bolder colour, but for a traditionally coastal colour scheme in the bathroom, why not team with bright teals and aquas? Keep the base of the room white and use the gorgeous green-blues to accessorise.

products.title: Richmond (Blackout) Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Keep out the night-time light with the quality richmond (blackout) in pure; mixing practicality with style, this blind will help you to get the best night's sleep possible. And as if that wasn't enough, it also features adjustable louvres, which allow you to alter the light entering the room. Feature the pure in your master bedroom to benefit from its blackout function, and to create a sophisticated decor theme with alluring qualities.

products.title: Lusso Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The lusso pure features a distinct and enthralling texture that is sure to catch your eye and create a sophisticated scheme. This modest blind presents a soothing white shade that will blend perfectly into any scheme, whilst also featuring adjustable louvres which allow you versatile light control. Complement the pure with a frame of sumptuous linens in deep aubergine or soothing cornflower blue to create a contrasting casing to help to boost both the texture and brilliance of the blind.

products.title: Splash (Blackout) Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a combination of iridescent style and practical usability, make the splash (blackout) in pure your blind of choice. The glimmering sheen will add life and sparkle to your windows, and the manoeuvrable louvres allow you to adjust the light to your liking. In an area where you need surfaces and furnishings that are easy to clean, such as the kitchen or family dining area, there's no better option than the pure.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout) Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: On a shimmering, off-white backdrop, the ajanta (blackout) pure features a cracked white patterning that catches in the light as the blind moves. With a durable, wipe-clean surface, this blind satisfies your need for function and practicality, as well as looking attractive and fresh. For a classic bathroom colour scheme, set the pure against blues and silvers, whether in the detail of the tiling, the colour of the towels, or the style of your sink fittings.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout) Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Somehow daring and discreet at the same time, the rapture (blackout) in pure combines an ice white background with flits of grey and dashes of barely-there silver, resulting in a gorgeous vertical blind that twinkles in the sunlight. The pure makes a practical option for a kitchen, where wipe-clean surfaces are a must, and would be accented beautifully by white units, grey appliances, and silver fixtures and fittings.

products.title: Affinity Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The leaf-like patterning of the affinity pure will light up a room's dcor and you'll be sure to notice it catching the light. This blind blends class with functionality, as its cutting edge filter fabric and no-fuss louvres make this a usable and durable window covering. Go cool and fresh in the kitchen by setting the pure against sky blue walls and light, natural woods. This blind would also make a pretty addition to a guest or master bedroom, where tranquillity and calm rule the roost.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Snow - Vertical Blind
products.description: The beneficial and beautiful origin (blackout) in snow features a valuable blackout attribute, which allows you to conquer the night-time light. This quality blind creates a modern look with its brilliant white shading and contemporary, changeable louvres for the added bonus of your privacy and shading preferences. Use the snow in your master bedroom to benefit from its hidden blackout quality. Match the stark white of the blind with a creative, colourful wallpaper or simple, chalky pink paint.

products.title: Cotswold Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: The matt, chalky finish of the cotswold in cosmic white is right on trend, and will work amidst a range of decor schemes. A matching wooden pelmet and bottom rail give this blind a streamlined edge, with no obtrusive detailing detracting from its effect. Perfect for a shabby chic theme in a light, vintage bedroom, the cosmic white will look stunning against sweet duck egg walls. Include pretty floral patterns in the room, whether in the bedlinen or accenting cushions, and don't be afraid to add a complementary shade of pink for extra depth.
